name: Velociraptor Dinosaur Simulator 3D
description:
Be a VELOCIRAPTOR and SURVIVE THE JURASSIC ERA

ROLE PLAY A VELOCIRAPTOR - Easy controls so you can live your life like a Velociraptor!

FIND JURASSIC GEMS - Find rare gems and jewels from the Jurassic era :)

3D SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself against other dinosaurs :)

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such as T-Rex, Stegosaurus, and many more :) Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous dinosaur land :)

CREATE A VELOCIRAPTOR FAMILY - Create, unlock, and raise your Velociraptor family to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies :)

BE A REAL-LIFE VELOCIRAPTOR - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest and explore caves, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey :)

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
